title: Step 1: Standardize skillregistry layout
description: Lock down the minimal runtime structure of the skillregistry repo (skills/, templates/, catalog/, docs/) and enforce the core rules (no large blobs in SKILL.md, overlays via templates, trusted-only).
acceptance_criteria: - Repo structure documented and stable\n- Validator exists to detect drift\n- Bootstrap + baseline skillsets align with the contract

title: Define and document the layout contract
description: Ensure docs clearly state what directories/files are allowed in skillregistry main, and where non-runtime history lives (beads).
acceptance_criteria: - docs/PRD.md states allowed top-level dirs\n- docs/CONTRIBUTING.md defines rules for adding skills/templates\n- README links to the canonical docs
close_reason: Already implemented via docs/PRD.md + docs/CONTRIBUTING.md + README

title: Add a repo validator (structure + SKILL.md frontmatter)
description: Create a small script (no deps) that validates: allowed directories, each skills/* has SKILL.md with name+description, folder name matches frontmatter name, templates/catalog exist, and no docs/research is present.
acceptance_criteria: - scripts/validate_registry.py runs with python3\n- Fails CI/local run on violations\n- Documented in docs/CONTRIBUTING.md

title: Bootstrap smoke test: local registry path + safe overlay update
description: Add a lightweight smoke test script that creates a temp repo, runs bootstrap against a local SKILLREGISTRY_GIT path, asserts expected artifacts, then mutates an overlay and verifies overlays_pending behavior.
acceptance_criteria: - Can be run locally without external deps\n- Verifies core DoD artifacts and overlay policy

title: Bank placeholders: keep minimal baseline skills
description: Ensure minimal baseline/lang skills remain concise and useful (tdd-loop, code-review, api-openapi-generic, lang-*).
acceptance_criteria: - All baseline/lang skills exist under skills/\n- Each has name+description frontmatter\n- No large reference content in SKILL.md
close_reason: Baseline/lang placeholder skills already present under skills/
